description:
I tried setting a a network shared folder as the target for my backups, but this application kept saying that there's no ping to the machine hosting the folder. I tried pinging with the CLI and everything was working ok, and I also tried getting in to the folder via the folder explorer and I had no problem with that either, so the problem was due the Back in Time. 

I wanted to use this app very much and was disappointed that it didn't work out of the box. To the developer(s), please fix or ease the method for using shared folders and I'll try using this app again.
summary: The UI and configuration of shared folders aren't intuitive

description: I have been using it for years, and I am writing this because I am surprised that it has so little reviews although this tool is so good.

I've been using Back In Time (BIT) for several years to automate backups on both my desktop and laptop computers.

The desktop backs up automatically to both a second internal drive plus a USB connected external drive.

The laptop backup is automatic to its second drive, and I do manual backups when connecting an external drive.

BIT's ability to run separate backup profiles simultaneously is what makes that possible.

One of BIT's strongest features is Auto-remove which lets you control how long backups are retained as well as setting how much free space is preserved on the drives.
summary: Easy to use, and very flexible

description:
Im a windows user and used to easy things, WHAT ARE SNAP SHOTS?
Program needs to be simplified to like... this hard drive to this hard drive making a back up of music or movies and has managment option that you can see whats going on
This is a very flexible backup program that I've used for many years in both Debian and Ubuntu installations. It ran fine up through Ubuntu 21.10, but no longer launches in Ubuntu 22.04.
summary: Flexible backup program. Does not launch in Ubuntu 22.04

description: The update on 2022-06-22 fixed the incompatibility with python 3. Glad to have back this excellent and unobstrusive backup utility.
I could not backup to external drives, and that is what I needed.

Most comfortable back solution for Linux so far. Easy to set up and easy to recover (once figured out how to reload the settings). Only one strage thing, after recovering my Thunderbird settings and emails were gone. Really appreciate the effort that went into this project. No hassling with millions of Rsync settings any more. What a relief! Would like to have the option to also store and restore installed packages.

Basé sur rsync, cet outil permet la sauvegarde de répertoires différents via la création de "profils". Maintient un historique des clichés doté d'une gestion intelligente. Possibilité de planification de chaque profil. Excellent outil de sauvegarde en particulier pour les "projets" de développement. Nettement supérieur à de nombreux autres outils de façade de rsync. Utilisé pour sauvegarde régulière vers un NAS.
summary: Un excellent outil de sauvegarde (mode fichier)

description: J'aurais voulu réaliser 2 sauvegardes sur des dossiers distinct, on ne peut gérer qu'une sauvegarde unifiée, ne correpsond pas à mon besoin...
pas compris la logique, ne me demande pas le disque externe, j'ai chargé luckybackup à la place qui a fonctionné direct!
summary: je ne comprends pas comment démarrer

description: c'est le meilleur logiciel de backup que j'ai trouvé

После настройки автоматически регулярно делает резервные копии всех пользовательских файлов. Файлы в бэкапе доступны непосредственно, лежат в определённой папке. Очень удобно. Несколько раз восстанавливал отдельные файлы. Бэкапы храню на внешнем зашифрованном диске.
summary: Отличная программа. Служит верой и правдой уже несколько лет
